      • createSongsAndDownload

        public void createSongsAndDownload​(java.util.Scanner scanner)
        TASK 4: Allow a user to partially specify a song, artist, or album, and then use a third-party tool to fill in missing details.
        Parameters:
        scanner - Get query song name from user and add more information from Musicbrainz API. API get request musicJson. Parser musicJson return list of songs, albums, and artists. Add songs, albums, artists to Database.
